item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, April 13, 2025 at 7:10 PM UTC
item.description:

25. How I install personal versions of programs on Unix (38 points | 24 comments)
26. Tesla Releases Stripped RWD Cybertruck: So Much Worse for Not Much Less Money (40 points | 30 comments)
27. Telling the Bees (17 points | 5 comments)

29. Experimental release of GrapheneOS for Pixel 9a (324 points | 211 comments)
30. How much oranger do red orange bags make oranges look? (9 points | 13 comments)
